original_text: When the chief priests and the Pharisees heard his parables, they perceived that he was speaking about them.
korean_text: 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 예수의 비유를 듣고 자기들을 가리켜 말씀하심인 줄 알고

sentences.original_text: When the chief priests and the Pharisees heard his parables
sentences.korean_translation: 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 그의 비유를 들었을 때

sentences.original_text: that he was speaking about them
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 자기들에 대해 말하고 있다는 것을
